name: Beautiful Blue Spiral Classic Dichroic Glass Pendant
description: This is one of my best selling classic dichroic glass pendants. It's got a black background capped with white, with a beautiful spiral blue and green reflective piece of dichroic glass in the center. I've smoothed the back with my grinder, and then attached a sterling silver plated bail. This pendant will fit on any standard snake chain. The pendant measures 1 in (24 mm) tall without the bail, or 1 1/8 in (29 mm) tall with the bail. It's 7/8 in (23 mm) wide and 1/8 in (5 mm) deep. This will ship in a cardboard jewelry box, and can be gift wrapped upon request. Chains are sold separately. Please visit my blog for more information about me.

name: Colorful Dichroic on Steel Fused Glass Pendant
description: This piece is very colorful. Red and green confetti glass are capped with a thin layer of yellow and blue dichroic spirals, then with a piece of clear glass to give the piece depth. It was fired twice in my kiln. The lopsided marble shape has then been secured to a stainless steel pendant plate. These are great colors! This pendant will fit on any standard snake chain. 1 1/4 in (30 mm) tall w/ bail; 3/4 in (29 mm) wide; 1/8 in (5 mm) thick fused glass pendant on a stainless steel pendant plate.This will ship in a cardboard jewelry box, and can be gift wrapped upon request. Chains are sold separately. Please visit my blog for more information about me.
